name: Wrong Side Of The Railroad
description:
Wrong Side Of The Railroad

This is a simple 2 player fighting game, Featuring Thomas the tank engine

I made this game because of the hopes and wishes of:

  1. @TeRuinedParagon
  2. @i-am-very-cool
  3. @UsedMarker
  4. @DeificCoder5303

The original conversation can be found here:

pixilart.com

Controls:

Player One:

  1. A for left
  2. D for right
  3.  W for jump
  4. Q & E for punch (They do the same thing)

Player Two:

  1. J for left
  2. L for right
  3.  I for jump
  4. U & O for punch (They do the same thing)

The attacks were inspired by this GIF:

Thanks to @DeificCoder5303 for the name, and thanks to @UsedMarker for the idea

Join me on Discord!

Feel free to comment game ideas down below!
